page.syntax: Status as P = a5_memo_editor2(P fp [,C title [,L readonly [,N cursor_position ]]])

argument.name: Status
argument.description: A dot variable containing the .insertion_point and .lastbutton elements.

argument.name: fp
argument.description: A dot variable with a .Text sub-element.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the Memo Editor.

argument.name: readonly
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = The text is read only.
.F. = The text can be edited.

argument.name: cursor_position
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The initial cursor location. Numeric

page.description: Opens a text editor. Used to edit memos when user clicks the pencil icon. Returns 'lastbutton' and 'insertion_point'
page.discussion: The A5_MEMO_EDITOR2() function displays the Memo Editor. and returns the last button pressed and the location of the cursor. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim ptr.text as C dim answer as P answer = a5_memo_editor2(ptr, "Editor") ? answer = insertion_point = 9 lastbutton = "save"
